messages.title: REJECT EXTREMISM... CHANGE BRITAIN'S FUTURE
messages.content: We are living through a challenging time in our country's future. But this is not a time to gamble on the extremism of right or left.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May's Tory party acts increasingly like Ukipo as she pursues a Hard Brexit that could blow up the stem damage to our economy and our communities.
issues.economy: Under Jeremy Corbyn, Labour is simply not up to the task.

leaflet.personalStatement: Rejected I would say this: no party works harder to get your views heard. As a Rothwell councillor, and leader of the Liberal Democrats on Leeds City Council, this has always been my driving force.

politicalExperience.role: Leader of the Lib Dems in Leeds

images.caption: Picture of Stewart Golton with others in an outdoor setting.
